title: What really happened at the Revolve Festival | Coachella 2022
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura give you the insider scoop of what it's like to attend Coachella, as well as their experience at Neon Festival and how to navigate the infamous Revolve Festival! Jumping fences, riding in a creepy man's car, an awkward celebrity interaction, sitting on black goo... lot of crazy things happened this weekend!
Check out the New Prism Collection at https://lunarbeauty.com/. Use code lauralee to get 10% off!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
